content:
<rule id="quarkus-keycloak-admin-client-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>

                <project>
                    <artifact artifactId="keycloak-admin-client" groupId="org.keycloak"/>
                </project>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <iteration over="default">
                    <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the 'keycloak-admin-client' dependency with Quarkus 'quarkus-keycloak-admin-client' extension">
                        <message>
                            Replace the `org.keycloak:keycloak-admin-client` dependency with the Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-keycloak-admin-client`  
                            No specific guide is available.
                        </message>
                        <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                    </hint>
                </iteration>
            </perform>
        </rule>
